title: Be a hero
descText: For my 2nd semester exam project, I worked along side two fellow students, on a website for the coaching company ‘Be a hero’, created by Benthe.
She needed a logo and a responsive website, that gives a quick overview of her business, its services, and who she is.
We came up with a simple design that is easy to navigate, it is build with HTML, CSS and Vanilla JS.

The logo is simple, and comes in multiple versions for scalablility, in wordmark and as a symbol. The symbol I created, we refer to as a ‘cape’. The ‘cape’ is an organic and clean-cut shape, inspired by a lavender flowerpetal, and a superhero cape.

title: Recipes
descText: A recipe app build with React, and Chakra UI.
Using Spoonaculars API, I can fetch different kinds of recipes, sorting them into different categories and cuisines, such as 'vegetarian', 'Italian' and so on.
It also has a 'Favorites' page, so you can save the recipes you like, by clicking the heart button on the recipe cards.
shortText: A recipe app build with React, and Chakra UI.
Using Spoonaculars API, I can fetch different kinds of recipes, sorting them into different categories and cuisines.

title: TaskRoomies V.1
descText: The first iteration of the web app, TaskRoomies
A web app for roommates, dorms and other cohabitants.
TaskRoomies is a web app for roommates, dorms and other cohabitants.
Its purpose is to provide a clear, easy overview of the shared household chores, and thus remove the stress and mental energy of keeping track of who does what, and when.
It also comes with a personal list, to keep track of all your personal to-do's and chores.
shortText: The first iteration of the web app, TaskRoomies
A web app for roommates, dorms and other cohabitants.
Its purpose is to provide a clear, easy overview of the shared household chores, and thus remove the stress and mental energy of keeping track of who does what, and when.

title: Personal website v.3
descText: The third iteration of my personal website/portfolio. The first version, v.1, were made with plain HTML/CSS and vanilla JavaScript. Then, I made v.2 using with WordPress, as an examproject during my 2. semester.
Next, is v.3.1 which I made with React and regular CSS, I have since then updated it from CSS to use SCSS which then makes this version, v.3.2!
I am almost always doing something to improve my portfolio, with additions, edits and tweaks. In the future, I plan on upgrading my portfolio, from React to Next.
shortText: The third iteration of my personal website/portfolio. Build with React and SCSS.
I am almost always doing something to improve my portfolio, with additions, edits and tweaks. In the future, I plan on upgrading my portfolio, from React to Next.

title: Space Debris Inc
descText: Space Debris Inc is a project i work on as an intern at AKQA, alongside two other fellow interns, as a part of our intro.
Space Debris Inc is a futuristic company, handling waste disposal by launching waste into space, with rockets.
It consists of a website with info about the company, including a webshop to order trash pick-ups.
It also includes admin-functionality to create or edit rockets as well as launch them according to a time-schedule, as well as a dashboard to view sales-statistics over a day, month or year.
shortText: Intern-project, at AKQA, for the ficticious company, Space Debris Inc, a futuristic company, handling waste disposal by launching waste into space, with rockets.
It consists of a page with info about the company, including a webshop to order trash pick-ups, as well as admin-functionality to manage the rockets, as well as a dashboard to view sales-statistics.

title: Generaxion
descText: During my 2nd semester at the business academy, we were given the task of creating and incorporating a job agent prototype, for Generaxions job site, for any interested job seekers to use and apply through, and be notified if an open position suiting them were to be published.

Our goal were to make it easy, user-friendly and simple to use. We also needed to create some eye-catching branding for company’s social media platforms, to promote the job agent and reach possible job seekers.
shortText: During my 2nd semester at the business academy, we were given the task of creating and incorporating a job agent prototype, for Generaxions job site, for any interested job seekers to use and apply through, and be notified if an open position suiting them were to be published.

title: Miscellaneous
descText: Besides working on projects as a part of my education, I also experiment and do a lot of programming, designing or illustrating in my spare time, which also helps me learn and expand my knowledge.
These are just a few examples of what I have been working on: A Tic Tac Toe game, some vector illustrations made in illustrator, and an svg, which “draws” when you scroll.
shortText: Besides working on projects as a part of my education, I also experiment and do a lot of programming, designing or illustrating in my spare time, which also helps me learn and expand my knowledge.
